text: evar tam iṟaivaṉukku payapaktiyuṭaṉ naṭantu koṇṭārkaḷō avarkaḷ kūṭṭaṅkūṭṭamāka cuvarkkattiṉpāl koṇṭu varappaṭuvārkaḷ; aṅku avarkaḷ vantatum, ataṉ vācalkaḷ tiṟakkappaṭum; ataṉ kāvalarkaḷ avarkaḷai nōkki"uṅkaḷ mītu cānti uṇṭākaṭṭum, nīṅkaḷ maṇam peṟṟavarkaḷ; eṉavē atil piravēciyuṅkaḷ; eṉṟeṉṟum atil taṅkiviṭuṅkaḷ" (eṉṟu avarkaḷiṭam kūṟappaṭum)
